verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: spent] [ARG1: days] [ARG2: testing google and microsoft android keyboard apps] and the winner completely surprised me swiftkey default settings are clunky compared to gboard but with a few tweaks to the settings it becomes a sleeker more stylish more usable keyboard app google gboard huawei les misérables microsoft swiftkey
